title: MFTE Program Available Only, Pet Friendly, 24 Hour Gym Access!
posting_body: MFTE Affordable Homes Available!
Income/Rent Ratio: 3 times the rent in gross monthly income.
Verifiable employment income is required.

Some examples would be - 90 days of most recent paystubs or 6 paystubs minimum - new job offer letter (signed and dated by employer and employee) - Benefit Award Letter (All pages fated within 60 days)
-Gift Affidavit (If gifting is the primary source of income, the person gifting must be a qualified co-signer).
****Additional Income Requirements Needed/
Please Contact the Leasing Office for more Details****

Additional documents that are required: - Tenant Income Certification form completely filled out - Tenant Income Certification Questionnaire completely filled out - Complete and signed Tax Returns with all schedules/W2's for all employment - Profit and Loss statements if applicable for Business, self-employed, or sole proprietor -
If assets exceed $5,000, we will need 6 months’ worth of bank statements from all accounts ****Additional Income Requirements Needed/
Please Contact the Leasing Office for more Details****
At Kinect @ Lynnwood, we take your health and safety seriously, which is why we are offering online applications for our brand-new studio, one, and two bedroom apartments.
Contact us to schedule a tour, or if you have any questions, we’re happy to help!
Kinect @ Lynnwood blends luxe upscale style with convenient amenities and stellar location in Lynnwood, Washington.
Located by the Alderwood Mall, your new studio, one, or two bedroom apartment puts you in the epicenter of shopping, dining, and fun.
Close to I-5, Seattle is an easy commute away for work or play.
Our pet-friendly community is brand-new, with open-concept layouts perfect for the next movie night.
Onsite, you’ll have access to a terrace courtyard with grilling stations for your next summer barbecue.
Experience the best in life when you make the move to Kinect @ Lynnwood.
Amenities Include:
Pet-Friendly
Clubhouse
24-Hour Fitness Center
WiFi Available
Elevators
Onsite Management
Coffee Bar
Gated Parking Garage w/ Charging Stations
Resident Business Center
Gated Electronic Entrance
Upper-Level Courtyard w/ Lounge, Fire Pit, & Grilling Stations
Keyless Entry Homes
